title: Public transport for Anyma Presents Genesys: Saturday 23 November 2024
articleContent:
Anyma will make his Australian debut bringing his acclaimed audiovisual show ‘Genesys’ to Melbourne at the Flemington Racecourse! Public transport is your best way to enjoy it, with extra services to help you get to and from the Flemington Racecourse on Saturday 23 November.

The event will run:

  • Saturday 23 November: 1pm to 11pm

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Please visit the event website for further event information here.

 Metropolitan train

Getting to Flemington Racecourse

Trains will operate from Flinders Street (Platform 10), stopping at Southern Cross (Platforms 13 / 14) and North Melbourne (Platforms 5 / 6), then express to Flemington Racecourse (Platforms 1 / 2).

  • From 12:40pm until 1:40pm, services will depart every 10 minutes.
  • From 1:40pm until 4pm, services will depart every 20 minutes.

From 12:40pm until 4pm, services will return to Flinders Street express with passengers.

The final service from Flinders Street will depart at 4pm.

Leaving from Flemington Racecourse

Train will operate from Flemington Racecourse (Platforms 1/ 2), stopping only at North Melbourne (PL 5) and Southern Cross (PL 13), en route to Flinders Street (PL 10).

  • From 9pm until 10pm, services will depart from Flemington Racecourse (Platform 1) to Flinders Street every 20 minutes.
  • From 10pm until 11pm, services will depart from Flemington Racecourse (Platform 1) to Flinders Street every 10 minutes.
  • From 11pm until 12:10am, services will depart from Flemington Racecourse (Platforms 1 / 2) to Flinders Street every 7 to 8 minutes.

The final service from Flemington Racecourse will depart at 12:10am from (Platform 2).

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Melbourne Showgrounds

Route 57

Additional Trams will operate from

  • Stop 1: Flinders Street Railway Station/ Elizabeth Street and
  • Stop 32: Sandown Road/ Epsom Road via Flemington Road

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from the Showgrounds 

The following bus route travels close to the Showgrounds: 

  • Route 472 (Williamstown to Moonee Ponds via Footscray) 

Passengers can catch buses from Footscray Station and alight at Langs Road/Showgrounds

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Regional train

Getting to the Melbourne Showgrounds 

Passengers arriving at North Melbourne and Southern Cross stations are advised to change trains and catch a Melbourne Showgrounds service. 

Refer to the Metropolitan trains section above for service times and platform information. 

Plan your journey using Journey planner. 

Leaving the Melbourne Showgrounds 

Passengers are advised to catch any train from Melbourne Showgrounds and alight at Southern Cross or North Melbourne stations and change to a regional train. 

Refer to the Metropolitan train section above for service times. 

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
